title: Did Kaylie McKinney tweet that Obama's brother was'still in that hot spot in Kenya'?
subtitle: The tweet was a contribution to the marking #ObamaTVShows.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The former White House journalist Kaylie McKinney once wrote on Twitter: "How did you meet your brother--it doesn't matter, I forgot he's still in that hut in Kenya #ObamaTVSow."
